csv

Class CsvFormatSpecifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • csv.CsvFormatSpecifier

  • public class CsvFormatSpecifier
extends Object
    Class used to define the CSV file format.

    This class contains 3 basic format description :

    • RFC
    • TDF
    • SQL

    WARNING : the QuoteType.Unquoted has a specific behaviour, and not the same as a plain space character !

    See Also:
    QuoteType, DelimiterType

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CsvFormatSpecifier RFC
      A CSV format based on the RFC4180.
      static CsvFormatSpecifier SQL
      The SQL CSV format used by commands like SELECT INTO FILE.
      static CsvFormatSpecifier TDF
      A tabulation delimited CSV format.

    • Field Detail

      • RFC

        public static CsvFormatSpecifier RFC
        A CSV format based on the RFC4180.

      • TDF

        public static CsvFormatSpecifier TDF
        A tabulation delimited CSV format.

      • SQL

        public static CsvFormatSpecifier SQL
        The SQL CSV format used by commands like SELECT INTO FILE. The format is tabulation delimited, and unquoted.
        See Also:
        UnquotedCsvLineParser

                  DelimiterType delim)
        Parameters:
        quoteType - The quote type used to quote CSV fields.
        delim - The delimiter type used to separate the CSV fields.
